info.title: Matches
info.description: The Toornament platform connects your website and application with the eSports tournaments around the world.

get.summary: Retrieves all matches of all your tournaments.
get.description: Retrieves the matches of all your tournaments using various filters. If the match type is "ffa", the opponents are limited by the first 4 ordered by their position.
Retrieves a match identified by the given id. If the match type is "ffa", a match returns a maximum of 100 opponents.

patch.summary: Updates information and outcome of a match.
patch.description: Updates information and detailed outcome of a match identified by the given id.

get.summary: Retrieve the matches of a tournament.
get.description: Retrieve the matches from the tournament. If the match type is "ffa", only the first 4 opponents, ordered by position, are listed in each match.

get.summary: Retrieves a match of a tournament.
get.description: Returns the match with the given id. A match is limited to 2 participants in “duel” type, and 100 participants in “ffa” type.

patch.summary: Update information and outcome of a match.
patch.description: Updates information and detailed outcome of a match.

scopes.organizer:result: Grants the ability to edit information and referee results.
Grants the ability to edit information and referee results.

matchRange.name: Range
matchRange.description: A range of requested items using the 'matches' unit. The size of the range can not exceed 128. (see [Pagination](https://developer.toornament.com/v2/overview/pagination)).

tournamentId.name: tournament_id
tournamentId.description: The id of the tournament you want to retrieve data about.

tournamentIds.name: tournament_ids
tournamentIds.description: Only return matches for the given list of tournaments.

id.name: id
id.description: The id of the requested match.

stageIds.name: stage_ids
stageIds.description: One or several stage ids to filter.

stageNumbers.name: stage_numbers
stageNumbers.description: One or several stage numbers to filter.

groupIds.name: group_ids
groupIds.description: One or several group ids to filter.

groupNumbers.name: group_numbers
groupNumbers.description: One or several group numbers to filter.

roundIds.name: round_ids
roundIds.description: One or several round ids to filter.

roundNumbers.name: round_numbers
roundNumbers.description: One or several round numbers to filter.

statuses.name: statuses
statuses.description: One or several match statuses to filter.

scheduledBefore.name: scheduled_before
scheduledBefore.description: A datetime to include all matches scheduled before or at the datetime in RFC 3339 format (combined date, time and utc offset).

scheduledAfter.name: scheduled_after
scheduledAfter.description: A datetime to include all matches scheduled after or at the datetime in RFC 3339 format (combined date, time and utc offset).

playedBefore.name: played_before
playedBefore.description: A datetime to include all matches played before or at the datetime in RFC 3339 format (combined date, time and utc offset).

playedAfter.name: played_after
playedAfter.description: A datetime to include all matches played after or at the datetime in RFC 3339 format (combined date, time and utc offset).

disciplines.name: disciplines
disciplines.description: Only return matches for the tournaments with the discipline.

participantIds.name: participant_ids
participantIds.description: One or several participant ids involved in the matches to filter.

matchIds.name: match_ids
matchIds.description: Only return matches for the given list of ids.

userIds.name: user_ids
userIds.description: One or several player user ids involved in the matches to filter.

teamIds.name: team_ids
teamIds.description: One or several team ids involved in the matches to filter.

customUserIdentifiers.name: custom_user_identifiers
customUserIdentifiers.description: One or several custom user identifiers involved in the matches to filter.

circuitIds.name: circuit_ids
circuitIds.description: Only return matches for the given list of circuit ids.

circuitSeasons.name: circuit_seasons
circuitSeasons.description: Only return matches for the given list of circuit season machine names.

circuitRegions.name: circuit_regions
circuitRegions.description: Only return matches for the given list of circuit region machine names.

circuitTiers.name: circuit_tiers
circuitTiers.description: Only return matches for the given list of circuit tier machine names.

sort.name: sort
sort.description: A method to sort the filtered data. "structure" sorts using the stage, group, round and match numbers. "schedule" sorts using the scheduled date. "latest results" sorts using the date at which the matches were played (not scheduled).

settings.description: Settings that describe the various options related to the match.

scheduled_datetime.description: The scheduled date of the match in RFC 3339 format (combined date, time and utc offset).

public_note.description: Public note of a match, written by the organizer.

private_note.description: Private note of a match, written by the organizer.

stage_id.description: The id of the stage that contains this match.

group_id.description: The id of the group that contains this match.

round_id.description: The id of the round that contains this match.

number.description: The match number (a relative identifier within a round).

played_at.description: The date and time when the match was completed (a result was provided).

report_closed.description: Whether the match report is closed.

opponents.description: List of the opponents involved in this match.
List of the opponents involved in this match.

tournament_id.description: The id of the tournament that contains this match.
The id of the tournament that contains this match.

opponents.description: List of the opponents involved in this match.

number.description: The match opponent number (a relative identifier within a match).

position.description: The match opponent position (calculate by internal processes).

result.description: The match result of the opponent.

rank.description: The match rank of the opponent.

allOf.description: The participant identified with this opponent.

properties.description: Features of the game played by the opponent.
Features of the game played by the opponent.

custom_user_identifier.description: An external custom user identifier. Use the format that suits your needs.

custom_fields.description: The values of the custom fields configured in the tournament using the machine names as keys. For more information, please read the [Custom Fields](https://developer.toornament.com/v2/core-concepts/custom-fields) documentation.
